title: 2tonnes World Version Intercompany training - Online (in english)
description:
[Online : 2tonnes Training in English with the World version]
‚úÖ Ô∏è What is the prerequisite for taking this training course ?
-Have participated in a 2tonnes World workshop.
üìÅ What will you learn from this training ?
This training will allow you to :
-Master the workshop process and be able to facilitate it
-Learn how to use the web platform
-Experience a live demo
-Understand the unique and essential role of companies in the climate change transition
-Benefit from the expertise of the facilitator
-Have your questions answered
After the training, you will have access to further resources on the web platform and to videos and readings to deepen your expertise.
You will be part of our community of volunteer facilitators. You will also have the opportunity to keep in touch with members of your group via a Slack channel.
Please note : Upon completion of the 2tonnes workshop, you will have the right to facilitate it for free. However you will not have commercial rights. To have the right to charge for the workshop you are required to complete a second training course.
üìù How is the training course organized ?
-How many people can train at the same time ? 12 people maximum
-How many people from the same company ? 3 people maximum. Beyond 3 people, two solutions : either you book an intra-company training session, i.e. a specific training for your company or you split the number of people and wait for the next session.
The price includes participation in the 4 hour training course, access to all the self-training tools, access to the web platform, the right to use the course on a voluntary basis or with colleagues, and the 2 follow-up sessions of 45 minutes to be planned with the entire class.
-And lastly, how much will it cost to facilitate with my colleagues ? 20‚Ç¨ HT/participant (a degressive rule applies above 500 participants)
Practical information
Make sure to connect 5 minutes before the start of the event.
If you have any question, please reach out to us at ophelie@2tonnes.org !

title: Formation √† l'animation

description:
Description
‚ö† Cette formation demande d'avoir particip√© pr√©alablement √† un atelier de La Fresque du Climat ‚ö† 

‚úèÔ∏è La Formation

‚òÄÔ∏è Contenu de la formation : 
üîπPr√©sentation de la Fresque (l'association, la licence...) 
üîπPr√©sentation des objectifs de l'animation et du r√¥le d'animateur¬∑rice 
üîπMise en situation de l'atelier avec des points d'attention sur la posture d'animateur¬∑rice 
üîπPr√©sentation des outils mis √† votre disposition pour vous accompagner dans l‚Äôanimation de la Fresque (manuel de formation, techniques d‚Äôanimation...) et vous lancer ! 

üëâ Informations pratiques : 
üîπDur√©e de 3h 
üîπLa Recyclerie qui accueille cette formation propose un espace bar. Possibilit√© de prendre un verre ou manger un morceau avant ou apr√®s l'atelier https://www.larecyclerie.com/ 
üîπ Tarifs : standard et prix r√©duit. Le/la participant¬∑e s‚Äôinscrit √Ä TITRE PERSONNEL, en r√©glant lui-m√™me les frais d‚Äôinscription. L‚Äôassociation ne fournit pas de facture ni d‚Äôattestation de participation.

title: Formation √† l'animation
description:
Description
Attention : avoir particip√© √† un atelier La Fresque du Climat complet (3h), dans les 6 derniers mois, est un pr√©-requis obligatoire.
 
üéì OBJECTIF DE LA FORMATION

 La formation √† l'animation vous permettra d'obtenir toutes les informations n√©cessaires pour animer b√©n√©volement des ateliers en autonomie √† destination du grand public, ainsi que de rejoindre la communaut√© des Fresqueuses et Fresqueurs.
 
 Si vous souhaitez animer dans un cadre professionnel (dans votre entreprise ou sous forme de prestation payante), il existe une formation sp√©cifique de 7h, qui permet d'accorder davantage de temps au d√©ploiement de l‚Äôatelier dans ce cadre sp√©cifique.
 
üïê Dur√©e : 3h30
  
  üíª Logiciels utilis√©s :
  Jitsi et Mural. Si vous n'avez jamais utilis√© Mural, voici un tr√®s court tuto (3min) : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5aHsxLnNlZw; vous pouvez √©galement vous faire la main sur cet espace "bac √† sable" (¬´ view as visitor¬ª).
 
üìñ Contenu :
  
  - Tour de table et pr√©sentations des participants
  - Pr√©sentation de l'atelier et de l'association (gen√®se, philosophie, objectifs, ...)
  - Remise en situation de la phase de r√©flexion de l'atelier
  - Conseils d‚Äôanimation
  - Pr√©sentation des outils mis √† votre disposition pour vous accompagner dans l‚Äôanimation de la Fresque (MOOC, manuel de formation, techniques d‚Äôanimation, ‚Ä¶)
  - Pr√©sentation de la communaut√© des fresqueurs.euses.
  
  üí°INFOS PRATIQUES :

 - Dur√©e : 3h30
- La formation se d√©roulant en ligne, une bonne connexion internet et une pi√®ce au calme sont n√©cessaires pour assurer la fluidit√© des √©changes.
 - Il est n√©cessaire d'utiliser un ordinateur (pas de tablette), une souris avec molette, si possible des √©couteurs ou un casque pour √©viter les √©chos, un micro fonctionnel et un navigateur comme Chrome ou Mozilla pour Mural.
 - Merci d'arriver 5 √† 10 minutes en avance pour commencer et terminer √† l'heure.

title: OCEAN COLLAGE 28/09/2024 ONLINE FACILITATED BY CRISTINA S.
description:
Take part in a La Fresque Oc√©ane workshop to discover and better understand the marine ecosystem!
  Do you know which marine species is immortal? Where do green tides come from? What's the difference between longline fishing and trawling? What proportion of goods transported by sea?

Come and discover the "Fresque Oc√©ane", a fun, collaborative workshop that will give you a better overall understanding of the challenges facing the ocean, both in terms of threats and opportunities, and inspire you to take action, both individually and collectively!

Its fascinating biodiversity, its essential role in the climate machine, the extent of its many resources, but also the impact of our daily activities and actions will no longer hold any secrets for you.

Created by Alice Vitoux and inspired by "La Fresque du Climat", this workshop is open to everyone - citizens, local authorities, businesses and schools - and will immerse you in a collective underwater exploration.

For more information: www.fresqueoceane.org

title: ONLINE - Puzzle der Biodiversit√§t (DE) - mit Michael Kl√∂pper
description:
Das Puzzle der Biodiversit√§t ist ein spielerischer und kooperativer Workshop, der darauf abzielt, das Bewusstsein f√ºr die Problematik des R√ºckgangs der biologischen Vielfalt zu sch√§rfen. W√§hrend dieses Workshops werden Sie die Funktionsweise von √ñkosystemen, die Rolle der Biodiversit√§t f√ºr das Wohlbefinden der Menschheit, die Interaktionen mit menschlichen Aktivit√§ten und die Bedrohung durch ihre Erosion entdecken.

Dieser Workshop wird online mit Hilfe eines Videokonferenz-Tools (z.B. ZOOM) und eines kollaborativen Tools (MURAL) durchgef√ºhrt. Die Teilnahme an diesem Workshop erfordert einen Computer mit einem funktionierenden Mikrofon.
Die Verbindungsinformationen werden vor dem Workshop per E-Mail verschickt.

Die Teilnahme an dem Workshop ist zu einem offenen Preis ab 10‚Ç¨ m√∂glich. Der gesammelte Betrag wird f√ºr die Finanzierung der Instrumente des Vereins "Fresque de la Biodiversit√©", f√ºr Sensibilisierungsma√ünahmen sowie f√ºr die Entwicklung des Netzwerks Fresque de la Biodiversit√© verwendet.

title: ONLINE Biodiversity Collage workshop (EN) - with Sergio Jacinto
description:
Workshop held in English

The Biodiversity Collage is a playful and cooperative workshop that aims to raise awareness around the stakes of biodiversity collapsing. During this workshop, you will discover the functioning of ecosystems, the part that Biodiversity plays for the Humanity well being, the interactions with human activities and the threat regarding its erosion.
This workshop will be held online using a videoconference tool (zoom) and a collaborative tool (MURAL). The participation to this workshop requires then a computer with a functioning microphone.
The connection info will be sent by email before the workshop.
  The participation to the workshop is under open pricing, starting from 10‚Ç¨. The collected amount will be used to finance the tools of the association "Fresque de la Biodiversit√©", actions to raise awareness as well as the development of the Fresque de la Biodiversit√© network.
  Length : 3h00
15 min Presentation of the workshop + Icebreaker + getting familiar with the tool Mural
30 min Starter to understand the mecanism of the ecosystems
75 min Biodiversity Collage, with 5 decks and 40 cards.
30 min Creativity, to pimp your collage absorb the information
30 min Restitution, debriefing and discussion

title: ONLINE DIGITAL COLLAGE TRAINING IN ENGLISH - ONLINE Training with Ash Goddard
full_location: Online
description:
Please note that this facilitation training is intended for people :
- who have attended a Digital Collage workshop in the last 6 months
- who have already attended a Climate Fresk workshop (please contact us if you are unable to meet this requirement)

Your ticket is not modifiable and it is refundable only up to 7 days before the training. Would you please ensure you'll be really be able to attend this event, in order to maximize the group collective intelligence. Thanks in advance.

This training will allow you then to facilitate Digital Collage workshops in any non-commercial context under the Creative Commons BY-NC-ND license. In order to facilitate within a professional context, this will be soon available ; additional prerequisites will be required as well as the signature of a contract with the organisation. We will come back to this at the end of the training. 

This session will take place online using a video conferencing tool and a visual collaboration tool. All technical information will be sent by email to registered participants a few days before the workshop. Out of respect for other participants, nobody will be accepted if more than 10 minutes late.
Once registered, your name, first name and email will be sent to the facilitator in charge of this session, in order to send you a briefing email before the session and another email after. This data will not then be kept by the association.

title: [ONLINE ]CONSTRUCTION COLLAGE WITH OLGA
description:
Construction Collage is a participatory workshop that breaks down how the construction and built environment industry affects the living world.
  During the workshop, you will :
In a small group, play out 45 game cards on the themes of urban planning, design, construction, and use of resources.
Find the cause and effect links between the different components of the industry by positioning and linking the cards.
Form a mind map to understand the big picture of the environmental and social issues of the construction industry.
Propose and discuss solutions.
  Duration
3h15. The time flies by, so please arrive 5 minutes early, we start sharp.
  Who is it for?
Everyone is concerned by climate change and biodiversity loss. Construction Collage was therefore designed for people with an interest in the construction sector, as well as for all construction professionals: the former will discover the subject and deconstruct their prejudices, while the latter will go deeper and question their practices.
  Make sure you have good internet connection and a laptop or a desktop to play from,  tablettes and phones will not work.  You willl find the a zoom link in your confirmation email.

Les enfants manipulent  cartes,  ficelles et  rubans pour composer l‚Äô√©norme empreinte carbone de Maxi-Chou et la minuscule empreinte de Mini-Chou. title: Diversity Fresco
full_location: Paris-La D√©fense, France
description:
The Diversity Fresco is a 3-hour workshop to raise awareness about how discrimination work, and setting a frame to dialogue and understand. 
The workshop is based on the principle of collective intelligence and allows to experiment the cognitive mecanismes at work behind discriminations. By discovering the possible approaches to reduce them and discuss their impacts and limits, you will aquire a common vocabulary that will make it easy to have open and contructive dialogues on the matter.  
The workshop will be facilitated by senior facilitators. 
----- 
Do you have any need you'd like us to know as to allow you to fully participate to the workshop ? Contact us to make the necessary arrangements. 
-Ôªø----
The diversity Fresco is a workshop co-designed by Belugames & l'Essec Business School.
https://fresquedeladiversite.org/

title: Textiles UnTangled Facilitator Training
description:
Check the time in your location:
Event Time Announcer - Textiles Untangled Faciltator training (timeanddate.com)
  Trainers : Lavanya JAYAKAR and Dagica MATEKOVIC RUBIC
This is a 4-hour training to become a Textiles Untangled facilitator for the general public. In order to do this training, you must have already participated in the 3-hour workshop in any language.
See below for details about the training.
This training will be held online. We will be using Mural & a videoconferencing tool. Please make sure you have:
- A strong internet connection
- A computer with a mouse or trackpad (no tablets/ipads/phones)
All technical details will be sent to registered participants by e-mail (to the address provided when you registered).
Commitment and Cancellation
This training is a small group workshop (max 14 participants) that needs a minimum to fully capitalise on our collective intelligence. If you must cancel, please do so a week before. Request a refund via Billetweb and it will be granted, minus the Billetweb fees. If cancelled within a week, please let us know. You are welcome to transfer the ticket to someone else. You can notify us at greendonut.info@gmail.com. Thanks in advance.
****************
As a General Public Facilitator, you can be a volunteer facilitator in the following situations: 
Workshops for the general public
Festivals for the general public
Schools, universities, and other institutions of learning.
You will not yet be allowed to facilitate in the following situations:
For employees or clients of a company (even if it is at your company)
At professional events or conferences, including networking & inter-company events
For a group of professionals as part of a private event.
(If you would like to deploy this workshop within your company:  contact us about our specialised training programme for professionals.)
****************
The facilitator map : Please read this facilitator map carefully, which details the different levels of experience and the requirements to facilitate for professionals in the industry, become a trainer, etc.
****************
Cost & time needed to complete this training & become an Autonomous facilitator
   - 4 hours - Training session (general public) : 35 EUR / 20 EUR
   - 2 hours - Study time & online quiz (Klaxoon)
   - 3.5 hours - Observe a workshop with an experienced facilitator (+ debrief)
   - 5.5 hours - Organise & co-facilitate a workshop with an experienced facilitator (+ debrief)
TOTAL 15-20 hours (with studying & practice)
